text:
Jensen Ross Ackles (born March 1, 1978) is an American television actor. He is best known for his role as Dean Winchester in the television series "Supernatural" (2005–present). He has also appeared in other television shows such as "Days of Our Lives", "Dark Angel" and "Smallville".
Ackles was born in Dallas, Texas. He is the son of Alan Ackles, also an actor. He has been married to Danneel Harris since 2010. The couple have three children.
